title: As Fans File Petition To Nominate Him, Robert Downey Jr Turns Down His Own Oscar Campaign
text:
As Fans File Petition To Nominate Him, Robert Downey Jr Turns Down His Own Oscar Campaign

As Fans File Petition To Nominate Him, Robert Downey Jr Turns Down His Own Oscar Campaign

“Let’s not,” those are the two words Robert Downey Jr said about his Oscar nominations.

On one hand, the fans have already declared what they want. They want their Iron Man aka Tony Stark alias Robert Downey Jr, whom they love 3000, to bag the Oscar trophy. Or at least, they want to get him an Oscar nomination.

Several fans have created change.org petitions to help him bag a nomination. Thousands of fans have already signed those petitions. But what does Robert Downey Jr, the man himself, feels about it. He apparently, turned down his own Oscar campaign.

“I'm so glad you brought this up because there was some talk about it, and I said 'let's not' and because I'm much more like you than you might really want to believe,” Robert Downey Jr told the host on the 'The Howard Stern Show live'.

So did he remove himself from the running? Well, that remains unclear. But one thing is for sure, that Robert Downey Jr has no interest in an Oscar campaign.

He also said, “I listen to the show and I agree with most all of your opinions, varied though they may be. Occasionally, you'll go on some tributary trail of thought [and] I'll go like, 'Oh that's not how I see it, but I love that you see it that way.”

“I'll tell you the truth. I didn't expect [the Marvel Cinematic Universe] to become what it became, and it is this very large, multiheaded Hydra at this point."

Here's @Disney's "For Your Consideration" list for #AvengersEndgame's awards season campaign, which notably omits all of the film's actors & actresses... https://t.co/re7D0kNT9D pic.twitter.com/wVGAFQ30Sc — MCU Direct (@MCU_Direct) October 3, 2019

For the unversed, Disney has launched its 2019 For Your Consideration website where it will reportedly be campaigning for Avengers: Endgame in Oscar categories. The MCU fans were upset when Robert Downey Jr wasn’t in the list for Oscar nominations.
